ygData.subject: Re: Malachite in Qeynos? NO MORE?!?!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It happens everywhere. One of my human monk friends got upset when he came to Faydwer on visit about the prices. So we stood side to side and compared.
ygData.messageBody:
According to Jay Howard:
> It is not so much the fact the cost is more overall for everyone there, but
> for YOU. I can buy food cheap in Halas, but when I go to Surefall, the
> prices are THROUGH THE ROOF! It is cheaper for me to pay people to buy my
> food for me and I still save money over what the Vendor charges.

It happens everywhere. One of my human monk friends got upset when he
came to Faydwer on visit about the prices. So we stood side to side and
compared.

Merchants are racists. Even in your guildhouse do they rip you. Over the
8th level spells, I spare almost a platinum by going back to Felwithe
over the Freeport prices.

--
